constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 67 (Monday, April 25, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 7568.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 17 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H4459]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: District of Columbia Courts and Public Defender Service Employment Non-Discrimination Act
